Item.Line: Hello, welcome to my home. How may I help you?
I am currenting collecting recommendation letters from the six grand masters.
Aha, so you must be aiming for the International Conducting Competition.
Let me tell you a secret: the piece you are going to perform in the competition will be composed by a Russian composer.
Thank you, but how do you know that?
Well, I was one of the judges in the competition last year.
Wow cool! Do you have any more advice for me?
Here, check out this piece when you are free.
(*Player receives the piece "Flight of the Bumble Bee"*)
If you can master this piece, you should be more than prepared for the competition.
